subject: Economy
question_en: What is the term used for the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a specific time period?
question_hi: एक देश के बंदरगाँव में एक उत्तराधिका क्या होता है।
explanation_en:
National Income refers to the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders in a specific time period. It includes both domestic and foreign income earned by residents of the country.

The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur. Jaipur is a state-level city and not a national-level. National-level questions refer to the capital of India.

question_hi: राजन्⁍स्ताम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम
explanation_en: National Income is the measure of total value of goods and services produced in the country. The capital city refers to the city level.
explanation_hi: राजन्⁍स्⁍ताम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉलम aकामॉल
